Entries.default: "Don't much look like the edible kind, do they?"
"I see the fungus has made itself at home."
"Someone should have killed this stuff with fire before it reached the books."
"Careful where you step. We do not want these waking up."
"Heh. Had me some of these once. Were tasting colors for days."
"Want to try eating one? I'll try not to let it kill you."
"These share some kind of simple consciousness. How intriguing."
"Neglect and incompetence. What this place needs is a motivated cleaning staff."
"This place is filthy. Why did we come here?"
